text: (obagē saturan obava vināśa kara damana avasthāva balāporottuven siṭīma nisā) viśvāsavantayin siyallanma (tamangē raṭagama athæra) piṭamaṁ vī yāma kisima avasthāvaka sudusu næta. dharma kāraṇāvan dæna gænīmaṭa (adahas kaḷahot ē venuven) ovungen sǣma samuhayakinma samaharek pamaṇak piṭatva giyahot madida? (ovun dharma kāraṇāvan igena gena) tamangē daruvan veta āpasu hærī pæmiṇa ovunṭa (taman igena gat dæya pavasā) biya ganvā anaturu an̆gavannāha. (gamē siṭinavun) pravēsamen siṭa (tama janatāva ārakṣā kara) gannāha
